      • createLoginFile

        public static void createLoginFile​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> users,
                                   java.lang.Boolean success)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        This logs login information onto a txt file There is also use of a lambda expression in this method, its being used to write failed and successful logins of the user into the log.txt file
        Parameters:
        users - list of users
        success - the success of the login
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of an error
